details: Choice of gardening service. For the building at 1725 Slough Avenue. The vote will decide, with whom the two-year contract will be signed.
subject: Gardening service supplier

options.title: Sacamano Bob- self employed
options.info: Self-employed worker, will work 3 days a week, 8 hours each day. Will mow the grass and trim the trees on a weekly basis. 8 dollars per hour. Expenses to be paid by the consortium.

options.title: Las rosas Services
options.info: Gardening service with all expenses included. They will work 4 days a week, 8 hours, with rotating personnel. They will be in charge of the maintenance of the entire property, as well as the replacement of any damaged plants. 15 dollars per hour.

options.title: Chris & Ed Brothers
options.info: Family service, two people working. Will mow the grass and trim the trees on a weekly basis. 4 hours, 4 times a week. 5.5 dollars per hour each. Expenses to be paid by the consortium.
